name: Pandemic shopping
description:
Note:
This is a parody!
Everyone deals with stress differently. If you do not want to think about the recent events or find any jokes about it tasteless and insulting, please do not check out this project. It is not meant to be offending anyone!

What is this?
This is just a silly little idea that came to me when I saw the crazy horders taking all toilet paper from our stores. It helped me distract myself and improve my coding skills. So far its just a very tiny demo, I am planning on finishing it at some point.

Train how to properly buy the things you need! No need to go outside and endanger yourself, just sit safely in front of your pc and get those mad shopping skills up!

Controls:
Use WASD to manoveur your shopping cart towards one of those sweet stocked shelves - then violently bump into them to make all the desired (acutally, just any of them) items fall off and hopefully into your cart.
Do not forget to hold R to check out your shopping list!
